Use Agentic AI to Get the Job Done
==================================

[](https://luminary-ai.com/team/)

This Agent is designed to give you a high level analysis bringing together a array of abilities

This Agent specilizes in customer communications and service.

Creative Approach

We work with your documents!
============================

Luminary AI system can have ZERO hallucinations because you can have all the answers come from your document.

*   Full confidence in the answers
*   Link to the exact reference from the documents from which the answer was created
*   Select what documents your answer comes from 

[Learn More](https://luminary-ai.com/about/)

what we do

Find solutions to client problems using internal and external tools promising the highest quality and pride.
============================================================================================================

###### Atilla Kocsis

CEO

###### Optimize Your Business

GPT was not designed for business, GAT was.
===========================================

GPT is Generative assembling answers based on the statistically best, next word.  GAT (Graph Attention Network) is a reasoning AI.  It understands information at a fundamental level.

Look to the right for a simple analogy…

[Get Started](https://luminary-ai.com/help/)

![Image 17: butler-v2](https://luminary-ai.com/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/butler-v2-qwbl0wf4k1wftl4s5bcvgifn6i2onzjw9aom8bzc80.png) ![Image 18](https://luminary-ai.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/detective-v1.png)![Image 19](https://luminary-ai.com/wp-content/plugins/trx_addons/addons/image-effects/images/6.jpg)

Imagine a party… GPT as a skilled butler—attentive, quick to serve drinks, and ready to chat about any topic. He’s great at meeting individual needs and providing information on demand.  
Meanwhile, GAT is a detective, observing the entire room, noticing who’s talking to whom, and piecing together subtle connections.  
While GPT serves insights to each guest, GAT reveals the bigger picture, understanding underlying relationships others might miss.

![Image 20](https://luminary-ai.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/digitalphenom.png)

![Image 21](https://luminary-ai.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/maeyva.png)
